column4: BRIEF-Laredo Petroleum Expects To Report Q1 Gain On Derivatives Of About $9 Mln
column6: * LAREDO PETROLEUM SCHEDULES FIRST-QUARTER 2018 EARNINGS CONFERENCE CALL FOR MAY 3 AND PROVIDES COMMODITY DERIVATIVES UPDATE
column7: * LAREDO PETROLEUM INC - FOR THREE MONTHS ENDED MARCH 31, 2018, LAREDO EXPECTS TO REPORT A GAIN ON DERIVATIVES OF APPROXIMATELY $9.0 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
